item.title: A New Ranking Framework for Better Notification Quality on Instagram
item.description: Meta is enhancing Instagram notifications using machine learning and diversity algorithms. A new framework aims to reduce uniformity, offering a varied mix of notifications while lowering overall volume. This approach boosts engagement rates by ensuring users discover diverse content and creators. The goal is to balance personalization with a richer notification experience, avoiding overexposure to the same authors. #InstagramUpdates #MachineLearning #UserExperience #Diversity #SocialMedia
